thingsToDo.name: Lalibela Rock-Hewn Churches
thingsToDo.description: Explore the impressive rock-hewn churches in Lalibela, which are UNESCO World Heritage Sites.

thingsToDo.name: Simien Mountains Trekking
thingsToDo.description: Embark on a trek through the stunning Simien Mountains, home to unique wildlife such as gelada baboons and Ethiopian wolves.

thingsToDo.name: Blue Nile Falls Tour
thingsToDo.description: Visit the stunning Blue Nile Falls, one of Ethiopia's most popular natural attractions.

thingsToDo.name: Harar Jugol City Tour
thingsToDo.description: Experience the unique culture and architecture of Harar, an ancient walled city with over 80 mosques.

thingsToDo.name: Danakil Depression Tour
thingsToDo.description: Visit the otherworldly Danakil Depression, home to colorful hot springs, salt flats, and active volcanoes.

thingsToDo.name: Visit the Blue Nile Falls
thingsToDo.description: See the magnificent waterfalls of the Blue Nile River, one of the main tributaries of the Nile River.

thingsToDo.name: Explore the Lalibela Churches
thingsToDo.description: Marvel at the impressive rock-hewn churches of Lalibela, considered one of the wonders of the world.

thingsToDo.name: Hike in the Simien Mountains
thingsToDo.description: Take a hike in the stunning Simien Mountains and spot endemic wildlife such as the Gelada baboon.

thingsToDo.name: Attend the Timket Festival
thingsToDo.description: Experience the colorful Timket Festival, celebrating the Ethiopian Orthodox Epiphany.

thingsToDo.name: Visit the Harar Jugol
thingsToDo.description: Explore the walled city of Harar, a UNESCO World Heritage site and a center of Islamic culture.
